pageContent: Objective: The cost of radical prostatectomy (RP) compared to watchful waiting (WW) has never been estimated in a randomized trial. The goal of this study was to estimate long-term total costs per patient associated with RP and WW arising from inpatient and outpatient hospital care.

metaData.source:
The diagnostic role and mechanistic functions of exosomal lncRNAs in prostate cancer
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/36266385/
